projectId.description: Project id on which user has permissions
projectId.name: projectId

graphite.description: If you want to monitor your service with Graphite, you can set the custom parameter graphite. It expects the host and port where the Graphite metrics should be sent to.

max_disk_threshold.description: This component monitors ephemeral and persistent disk usage. If one of these disk usages reaches the default configured threshold of 80%, the a9s Parachute stops all processes on that node.

metrics_frequency.description: Frequency of metrics being emitted in seconds

metrics_prefix.description: Depending on your graphite provider, you might need to prefix the metrics with a certain value, like an API key for example.

plugins.description: The plugins repository-s3 and repository-azure are enabled by default and cannot be disabled.

sgw_acl.description: Comma separated list of IP networks in CIDR notation which are allowed to access this instance.

ssl_session_timeout.description: The content follows the nginx configuration file measurement units.

graphite.description: If you want to monitor your service with Graphite, you can set the custom parameter graphite. It expects the host and port where the Graphite metrics should be sent to.

ism_deletion_after.description: Combination of an integer and a timerange when an index will be considered 'd' and can be deleted from OpenSearch. Possible values for the timerange are s, m, h and d.

java_heapspace.description: Default: not set, 46% of available memory will be used. The amount of memory (in MB) allocated as heap by the JVM for OpenSearch.

java_maxmetaspace.description: The amount of memory (in MB) used by the JVM to store metadata for OpenSearch.

max_disk_threshold.description: This component monitors ephemeral and persistent disk usage. If one of these disk usages reaches the default configured threshold of 80%, the a9s Parachute stops all processes on that node.

metrics_frequency.description: Frequency of metrics being emitted in seconds

metrics_prefix.description: Depending on your graphite provider, you might need to prefix the metrics with a certain value, like an API key for example.

sgw_acl.description: Comma separated list of IP networks in CIDR notation which are allowed to access this instance.

java_heapspace.description: Default: not set, 46% of available memory will be used. The amount of memory (in MB) allocated as heap by the JVM for OpenSearch.

java_maxmetaspace.description: The amount of memory (in MB) used by the JVM to store metadata for OpenSearch.

metrics_prefix.description: Depending on your graphite provider, you might need to prefix the metrics with a certain value, like an API key for example.

plugins.description: The plugins repository-s3 and repository-azure are enabled by default and cannot be disabled.

sgw_acl.description: Comma separated list of IP networks in CIDR notation which are allowed to access this instance.

archive_timeout.description: The units of the property are seconds.

data_checksums.description: This option can only be set during creation of the service instance, and cannot be changed later.

effective_cache_size.description: The units of the property are MB. Please note, that our BOSH release includes an algorithm which calculates a usable value for this property on the fly based on the resources of the VM running.

graphite.description: If you want to monitor your service with Graphite, you can set the custom parameter graphite. It expects the host and port where the Graphite metrics should be sent to.

idle_in_transaction_session_timeout.description: The units of the property are milliseconds.

install_plugins.description: The plugins pgcrypto and citext are enabled by default.

maintenance_work_mem.description: The units of the property are kilobytes.

max_connections.description: You cannot decrease max_connections as this will break clustering. The default value increases with instance size.

max_disk_threshold.description: This component monitors ephemeral and persistent disk usage. If one of these disk usages reaches the default configured threshold of 80%, the a9s Parachute stops all processes on that node.

metric_databases.description: Expects an array of database names. If the parameter is not set or the array is set to empty, then metrics will be collected for all databases.

metrics_frequency.description: Frequency of metrics being emitted in seconds

metrics_prefix.description: Depending on your graphite provider, you might need to prefix the metrics with a certain value, like an API key for example.

sgw_acl.description: Comma separated list of IP networks in CIDR notation which are allowed to access this instance.

shared_buffers.description: The units of the property are MB.

statement_timeout.description: The units of the property are milliseconds.

temp_file_limit.description: An integer value greater than 0 kilobytes is expected. Alternatively -1 means no limit.

temp_files.description: The units of the property are kilobytes.

work_mem.description: The units of the property are kilobytes. Specifies the amount of memory to be used by internal sort operations and hash tables before writing to temporary disk files.

notify-keyspace-events.description: The allowed value must include the following characters only: [K,E,g,$,l,s,h,z,x,e,A,t]

info.description: The STACKIT MariaDB API provides endpoints to list service offerings, manage service instances and service credentials within STACKIT portal projects.
info.title: STACKIT MariaDB API

get.description: Get a list of available instances

requestBody.description: Parameters for the requested service instance provision

patch.description: Update a service instance. This could be a sgw acl update or a plan upgrade.

parameters.description: id of the instance being updated
parameters.name: instanceId

requestBody.description: Parameters for the requested update operation on service instance - sgw acl update, plan upgrade

get.description: get list all credentials ids for instance

parameters.description: Id of the credentials being deleted
parameters.name: credentialsId

get.description: get a service credentials by credentials id

parameters.description: Credentials id of credentials to fetch
parameters.name: credentialsId

get.description: Get the service offerings that the service broker offers.

tags.description: Represents the request to use a Service Instance. Service Credentials contain the credentials that can then be used to communicate with the Service Instance.
tags.name: Credentials

tags.description: An instantiation of a Service Plan.
tags.name: Instances
